name: kubeconform
description: FAST Kubernetes manifests validator, with support for Custom Resources!

repo.name: kubeconform
repo.description: A FAST Kubernetes manifests validator, with support for Custom Resources!

readme.summary: Excellent documentation with clear purpose, comprehensive examples, and multiple installation methods, though troubleshooting section could be more prominent.
readme.top_issue: Troubleshooting information is buried in GitHub issue links rather than having a dedicated section with common problems and solutions

injection_risks.description: The use of os.Getenv could potentially lead to environment variable injection, but it is not directly user-controlled.
The HTTP client does not validate the server's certificate by default when the --insecure-skip-tls-verify flag is used, which could lead to a man-in-the-middle attack.

critical_findings: Potential for environment variable injection in os.Getenv
security.summary: The kubeconform codebase has some potential security concerns, including input validation issues and the availability of an insecure TLS verification flag, but overall it appears to be well-structured and secure.

common_complaints: Schema location template not working reliably (multiple issues with -schema-location flag)
Duration format validation incomplete (doesn't support all Kubernetes API machinery formats)
Rate limiting issues when downloading schemas from GitHub
Crashes/panics with certain schema file content (nil pointer dereference)
Validation gaps - tool misses some errors while catching others inconsistently
sentiment.summary: kubeconform shows signs of maintenance neglect with multiple unresolved bugs, inconsistent validation behavior, and slow/unresponsive issue handling that frustrates users seeking reliable Kubernetes manifest validation.

communication.summary: The maintainer's responses are extremely helpful, clear, patient, and technically sound, making them an exemplary model for open-source project maintainers.

concerns: No active contributors in past 6 months
No merged PRs in past 6 months
No closed issues in past 6 months
86 open issues with no resolution activity
maintenance.summary: The project shows no maintenance activity for at least 6 months with a large backlog of unresolved issues and no contributor engagement.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README is well-structured and provides a good overview of the package, but some sections could be improved for better clarity and conciseness.
concerns: high number of open issues and PRs
Security: Potential for environment variable injection in os.Getenv
Security: Insecure connection possibility with --insecure-skip-tls-verify flag
High bus factor risk (87% from top contributor)
highlights: recent commits within the past 6 months
some issue and PR closure activity
